text: aur jab kaha jaata tha ki allaah ka vaada sachcha hai aur (qiyaamat kee) ghadee mein koee sandeh nahin hain. to tum kahate the, "ham nahin jaanate ki vah ghadee kya hain? to tum kahate the, ham nahin jaanate ki vah ghadee kya hai? hamen to bas ek anumaan-sa prateet hota hai aur hamen vishvaas nahin hota.
